00033 ResponseHandler::ResponseHandler()
00034 {
00035     serviced.resize(RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE);
00036     bufferFull = false;
00037     stoppedQueue = false;       
00038     responseBuffer.clear();
00039     for (unsigned int i=0; i<RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE; i++)
00040     {
00041         serviced[i] = false;
00042     }
00043 }
00044

00057 /*
00058  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059  *       Class:  ResponseHandler
00060  *      Method:  process_event
00061  * Description:  bool ResponseHandler::IsBufferFull()
00062  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063  */
00064 void ResponseHandler::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00065 {
00066     Request *req = new Request();       
00067     DRAMCmdState cmd;   
00068     int index;  
00069     vector<Request>::iterator bufferIndex = responseBuffer.begin();     
00070     switch (e->type)
00071     {   
00072         case PUSH_BUFFER:
00073              *req = *((Request*)e->event_data.at(0));
00074              responseBuffer.push_back(*req);
00075 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00076             cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << req->address << ": I am in ResponseHandler PUSH BUFFER with " << dec << req->cmdType << " and tag " << req->tag << endl;
00077 #endif
00078             delete (Request*)e->event_data.at(0);       
00079         break;
00080         case REPLY:
00081         {   cmd = *((DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0));
00082              index = SearchBuffer(&cmd);                // Search the req, returns the index
00083                 responseBuffer[index].busInsertionTime = cmd.req.busInsertionTime;      
00084                 *req = responseBuffer[index];
00085                 responseBuffer[index].serviced = true;
00086                 responseBuffer[index].retireTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now();
00087                 delete (DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0);
00088 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00089               cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << cmd.req.address << ": I am in Response Handler REPLY with tag " << dec << cmd.req.tag << endl;
00090 #endif
00091 #if MEM_STANDALONE
00092 
00093                 index = SendServiced();
00094                 *req = responseBuffer[index];
00095                 responseBuffer.erase(index+bufferIndex);                // delete the req from response buffer
00096                 IrisEvent* ev = new IrisEvent();
00097                 ev->type = MSHR_DELETE;
00098                 ev->dst = (Component*)mshrHandler[req->threadId];
00099                 Request *rr = new Request();
00100                 *rr = *req;
00101                 ev->event_data.push_back(rr);
00102                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &MSHR_SA_H::process_event, (MSHR_SA_H*)ev->dst, ev);
00103 #ifdef DEBUG        
00104 cout << endl << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << req->address << ": Total Time taken by request " << dec << req->retireTime - req->arrivalTime << endl;
00105 #endif   
00106                 ((MC*)mc)->stats->CollectStatsPerRequest(req);
00107             
00108 #else
00109              if (((NI*)((MC*)mc)->parent)->niQueue.empty() ) //&& !((NI*)((MC*)mc)->parent)->sending)
00110              {
00111                 index = SendServiced();
00112                  *req = responseBuffer[index];
00113                 ((NI*)((MC*)mc)->parent)->niQueue.push_back(*req);      // put the request into NI queue if its free
00114                 responseBuffer.erase(index+bufferIndex);                // delete the req from response buffer
00115                 IrisEvent* ev = new IrisEvent();
00116                 ev->type = OUT_PULL_EVENT;
00117                 ev->dst = ((MC*)mc)->parent;
00118                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NI::process_event, (NI*)ev->dst, ev);
00119 #ifdef DEBUG        
00120 cout << endl << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << req->address << ": Total Time taken by request " << dec << req->retireTime - req->arrivalTime << endl;
00121 #endif   
00122                 ((MC*)mc)->stats->CollectStatsPerRequest(req);
00123             
00124              }
00125              else
00126              {
00127                 responseBuffer[index].serviced = true;
00128              }
00129 
00130 #endif 
00131          
00132              break;     
00133         }
00134         case SEND_TO_NI:     
00135                   index = SendServiced();       
00136                 *req = responseBuffer[index];
00137                 
00138              if(index != -1 && ((NI*)((MC*)mc)->parent)->niQueue.empty() )
00139              {
00140                     ((NI*)((MC*)mc)->parent)->niQueue.push_back(*req);  // put the request into NI queue if its free
00141                      assert(responseBuffer[index].serviced == true);                    
00142                     responseBuffer.erase(index+bufferIndex);            // delete the req from response buffer
00143                     IrisEvent* ev = new IrisEvent();
00144                     ev->type = OUT_PULL_EVENT;
00145                     ev->dst = ((MC*)mc)->parent;
00146                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NI::process_event, (NI*)ev->dst, ev);
00147                     serviced[index] = false;   
00148 #ifdef DEBUG        
00149         cout << endl << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << req->address << ": Total Time taken by request " << dec << req->retireTime - req->arrivalTime << endl;
00150 #endif   
00151                     ((MC*)mc)->stats->CollectStatsPerRequest(req);
00152              }
00153 
00154              break;
00155               
00156         default:
00157                 cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": I should not come to default of process event in response handler\n";
00158     }           
00159     delete req; 
00160     delete e;
00161 }
00162 
00163 unsigned int ResponseHandler::SendServiced()
00164 {               
00165     for (unsigned int i=0; i<responseBuffer.size(); i++)
00166     {
00167                 if (responseBuffer[i].serviced)
00168                 {       
00169                 return i;
00170                 }
00171     }       
00172     return -1;
00173 }
00175 
00176 unsigned int ResponseHandler::SearchBuffer(DRAMCmdState *cmd)
00177 {               
00178     for (unsigned int i=0; i<responseBuffer.size(); i++)
00179     {
00180         if (responseBuffer[i].tag == cmd->req.tag)
00181         {       
00182             return i;
00183         }
00184     }       
00185     cout << "Error: scheduled cmd could not be found in Response Buffer\n";
00186     return -1;  
00187 }
00188 
00189 bool ResponseHandler::IsBufferFull()
00190 {
00191     if ( responseBuffer.size() > RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE-3 )
00192     {
00193         bufferFull = true;      
00194         return true;
00195     }
00196     else
00197     { 
00198         bufferFull = false;
00199         return false;
00200     }
00201 }
00202 
00203 bool ResponseHandler::CanStart()
00204 {
00205     if ( responseBuffer.size() <= 0.75*(RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE) )
00206         return true;
00207     else 
00208         return false;
00209 }

00211 std::string ResponseHandler::toString()
00212 {
00213 //      cout << bufferId <<endl;
00214         return "ResponseHandler";
00215 }
